name: Land's End (Polished Studios)
description:
One of the best games created in the Scratch language, now ported to Itch!  It's @ampara's Land's End!  

- The SPACE key can be used to select in almost any menu. - Use the mouse to CLICK when there is a button available.
- Use ARROW KEYS to navigate menus, the world map, the shop, and to change the angle of the ball's trajectory.
- Use SPACE key to enter a level on the map.

to see this game on Scratch, visit https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/310906817/
